00015 class Plugins_Linkedin_Publish extends Common_Publish
00016 {
00017     protected $_token;
00018     protected $_account;
00019     /**
00020      * @var Zend_Oauth_Client
00021      */
00022     protected $_client;

00024     /**
00025      * @return void
00026      */

00028     {
00029         parent::__construct();

00032     /**
00033      * Método para conectarse a una identidad Linkedin
00034      * @param obj $auth
00035      * @return void
00036      *
00037      * (non-PHPdoc)
00038      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#connect($token)
00039      */
00040     public function connect($token)
00041     {
00042         $this->_idUP = $this->_account->getId();
00043         $client = $token;
00044 
00045         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00046         $this->_config = $this->_ci->config->item('linkedin', 'apikeys');
00047 
00048         $options = array(
00049             'version' => '1.0',
00050             'localUrl' => site_url("app/testing"),
00051             'callbackUrl' => site_url('accounts/auth'),
00052             'requestTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/requestToken',
00053             'userAuthorizationUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/authorize',
00054             'accessTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/accessToken',
00055             'consumerKey' => $this->_config["key"],
00056             'consumerSecret' => $this->_config["secret"],
00057         );
00058 
00059         $this->_client = $client->getHttpClient($options);
00060         $this->_client->setMethod(Zend_Http_Client::POST);
00061         $this->_client->setUri('http://api.linkedin.com/v1/people/~/shares');
00062     }
00063 
00064     /**
00065      * Método que valida si el contenido a publicar es correcto.
00066      *
00067      * @param array $post
00068      * @param User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount
00069      * @return Message_Data
00070      *
00071      * (non-PHPdoc)
00072      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#validatePost($post, $targetAccount)
00073      */
00074     public function validatePost($post = null, User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount)
00075     {
00076         $this->_ci->lang->load("errormessages");
00077         $msg = new Message_Data();
00078 
00079         if (is_null($post) or !isset($post["comment"]) or $post["comment"] == "") {
00080 
00081             $msg->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("unknownError"));
00082         }
00083 
00084         if ( isset($post["title"]) and $post["title"] != "" ) {
00085 
00086             if(!isset($post["url"]) or $post["url"] == "") {
00087 
00088                 
00089                 $msg->setError("fieldset", sprintf($this->_ci->lang->line("requiredCertainField"), "url"));
00090             }
00091             
00092             if(!isset($post["description"]) or $post["description"] == "") {
00093 
00094                 if ($msg->getErrors("fieldset") == "") {
00095 
00096                     $msg->setError("fieldset", sprintf($this->_ci->lang->line("requiredCertainField"), "descripción"));
00097 
00098                 } else {
00099 
00100                     $msg->setError("fieldset",$msg->getErrors("fieldset")."<br />".sprintf($this->_ci->lang->line("requiredCertainField"), "descripción"));
00101                 }
00102             }
00103         }
00104 
00105         return $msg;
00106     }
00107 
00108     /**
00109      * Método para publicar contenido en cuentas linkedin
00110      * @param array $post
00111      * @param User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount
00112      * @return Message_Data
00113      *
00114      * (non-PHPdoc)
00115      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#publish($post, $targetAccount)
00116      */
00117     public function publish($post = null, User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount)
00118     {
00119         $this->_account = $targetAccount;
00120 
00121         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00122         $msg = $this->validatePost($post, $targetAccount);
00123 
00124         $msg->setIdU($auth->getUserId());
00125         $msg->setOwner("1");
00126 
00127         if ($msg->isValid()) {
00128 
00129             $account = $auth->getEnabledAccount($post["publishIn"]);
00130             $this->connect(unserialize($account->getAuth()));
00131 
00132             $private = (isset($post["private"]) and $post['private'] == 1) ? 'connections-only' : 'anyone';
00133 
00134             $xml = $this->_ci->load->view("plugins/linkedin/postTemplate", array(
00135                 "private" => $private,
00136                 "comment" => $post["comment"],
00137                 "title" => $post["title"],
00138                 "url" => $post["url"],
00139                 "img" => $post["img"],
00140                 "description" => $post["description"],
00141             ),  true);
00142 
00143             $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>'."\r\n".$xml;
00144 
00145             $this->_client->setRawData($xml,'text/xml');
00146             $this->_client->setHeaders('Content-Type', 'text/xml');
00147 
00148             $response = $this->_client->request();
00149             $code = $response->extractCode($response->asString());
00150             $content =  $response->getBody();
00151 
00152             if ($code >= 200 and $code <= 300) {
00153 
00154                 $msg->setTitle($post["comment"]);
00155                 return $this->fetch($msg);
00156 
00157             } else {
00158 
00159                 $this->_ci->lang->load("errormessages");
00160                 $msg->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("unknownError").". Error code ".$code." : ".$content);
00161             }
00162         }
00163 
00164         return $msg;
00165     }
00166 
00167     /**
00168      * @param Message_Data $myMessage
00169      * @return Message_Data
00170      */
00171     public function fetch(Message_Data $myMessage)
00172     {
00173         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00174         $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00175         $message  = New Message_Data();
00176 
00177         $this->_client->setUri('http://api.linkedin.com/v1/people/~/network/updates');
00178         $this->_client->setParameterGet("type","SHAR");
00179         $this->_client->setParameterGet("scope","self");
00180         $this->_client->setParameterGet("from", (time() -5) *1000);
00181         $this->_client->setMethod(Zend_Http_Client::GET);
00182 
00183         $response = $this->_client->request();
00184         $content =  $response->getBody();
00185 
00186         $data = new SimpleXMLElement($content);
00187 
00188         $message = Plugins_Linkedin_DB::save($data, 1, $this->_account);
00189         return $message;
00190     }
00191 
00192     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00193      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#reference($message, $account)
00194      */
00195     public function reference(Message_Data $message, User_Accounts_Data $account)
00196     {
00197         $this->_account = $account;
00198         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00199 
00200         if ($message->isValid()) {
00201 
00202             $this->connect(unserialize($account->getAuth()));
00203 
00204             $title = $message->getTitle();
00205             $shortUrl = Shorter::short($message->getLink());
00206 
00207             $xml = $this->_ci->load->view("plugins/linkedin/postTemplate", array(
00208                 "private" => 'anyone',
00209                 "comment" => $title." ".$shortUrl,
00210             ),  true);
00211 
00212             $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>'."\r\n".$xml;
00213 
00214             $this->_client->setRawData($xml,'text/xml');
00215             $this->_client->setHeaders('Content-Type', 'text/xml');
00216 
00217             $response = $this->_client->request();
00218             $code = $response->extractCode($response->asString());
00219             $content =  $response->getBody();
00220 
00221             if ($code >= 200 and $code <= 300) {
00222 
00223                 $message->setTitle($title." ".$shortUrl);
00224                 return $this->fetch($message);
00225 
00226             } else {
00227 
00228                 $this->_ci->lang->load("errormessages");
00229                 $message->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("unknownError").". Error code ".$code." : ".$content);
00230             }
00231         }
00232 
00233         return $message;
00234     }
